Interface BranchNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ASTNode, StatementNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BranchNodeImpl

    public interface BranchNode
extends StatementNode
    The node to represent a branch ("if") statement
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    "Frank Zechert"

      • setStatementNodeOnFalse

        void setStatementNodeOnFalse(StatementNode statement)
        Set the statement that is executed when the condition evaluates to false. This is the else statement. If there is no else set to null.
        Parameters:
        statement - The statement to execute when the condition evaluates to false or null if no else branch is needed.

      • getStatementNodeOnFalse

        StatementNode getStatementNodeOnFalse()
        The statement that is executed when the condition is false. This is the else branch. If no else branch exists this will return null.
        Returns:
        The statement to execute when the condition evaluates to false.
